text: Thomas Ellis Kirby (1846-1924) was an auctioneer at American Art Galleries. He was known as the "grand old man of the auction room". ==Biography== He was born in 1846. He married and had a son, Gustavus T. Kirby. He was one of the three founders of the American Art Association (AAA) in 1883 in New York. He died in 1924. ==References== Category:1846 births Category:1924 deaths Category:American auctioneers
title: Thomas Ellis Kirby
